title: Ticket #2620: crondor job misfired due to daylight saving change
description:
We run a daily crondor job at 00:15am to report usage of GLOW. On 2011-11-06, the day time changed back to normal time from daylight savings time, the crondor job ran twice in one day: once at 00:15am and once at 23:15pm. It behaved as though the extra hour was not taken into account when computing the next time to run on 2011-11-06. After the extra run on 2011-11-06, the crondor job ran as normal at 00:15am the next day, 2011-11-07.

The above problem happened to a crondor job on glow.cs.wisc.edu. Strangely, this same problem did not affect an identically configured crondor job on cm.chtc.wisc.edu. The condor version is close but not identical between these machines, but I don't know if that is the cause of the different behavior. 

   glow.cs.wisc.edu:
      $CondorVersion: 7.7.2 Aug 23 2011 BuildID: 363342 PRE-RELEASE-UWCS $
      $CondorPlatform: x86_64_rhas_3 $
   cm.chtc.wisc.edu:
      $CondorVersion: 7.7.2 Sep 27 2011 BuildID: 372978 PRE-RELEASE-UWCS $
      $CondorPlatform: x86_64_rhas_3 $

The cron-related attributes in the jobs are: 

   CronMinute = "15"
   CronHour = "0"
remarks:
2011-Nov-08 11:19:52 by danb:
The following code in condor_crontab.cpp seems relevant: 

   // We also use the same daylight saving time
   // attribute from when got the time struct up above
   ...
   matchTime.tm_isdst  = tm->tm_isdst;

I do not understand why we use the same daylight saving time setting from the current time when calculating the next time. The man-page for mktime() in linux says that if tm_isdst is set to -1, it will figure out what daylight savings time setting is applicable for the specified time. Why aren't we using that?

2011-Nov-08 11:26:08 by danb:
I think the reason cm.chtc.wisc.edu was not affected is that there was a reconfig at 21:05pm on 2011-11-06. A reconfig causes recalculation of cron schedules. Since this reconfig happened after the daylight savings shift, it used the correct value for tm_isdst. There was no reconfig on glow.cs.wisc.edu on 2011-11-06.
